display_long_description:
Download VAIL and experience the #1, highest-rated VR shooter, with precision-crafted gunplay, stunning visuals, and a constantly expanding world of modes, maps, and community.                       

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

[media]

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

[media]

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

[media]

# **CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED**

[media]

Join the party!
Discord.gg/VAILVR

Download VAIL and experience the #1, highest-rated VR shooter, with precision-crafted gunplay, stunning visuals, and a constantly expanding world of modes, maps, and community.

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499304357_2900903183445474_4361834184826380561_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=sR6-DIf_hEcQ7kNvwGkHMdn&_nc_oc=Adk5fIkNK18qJkB2Y8BhsKbdOZpWASrRyEbiNuMXgJUpR8RLKIKCyTNZ__10TyVvH20&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=GgLr1Z4sRewJfqqsjNLhlQ&oh=00_Afcae68rQbecoD_tKcdPZWRjFQ0Ar3KE7qpXNZG95Sm5aQ&oe=69041CEE)

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820855_968695222008877_5426560746443285977_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lmk9zYJiFcsQ7kNvwGZ34kr&_nc_oc=Adm6OGIz8ultkJMmM0u24LqWU8Oc5igPTHUP2WzsI5m1q6KE1OlnOC0lsdP_UW5aP04&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=GgLr1Z4sRewJfqqsjNLhlQ&oh=00_AfeWB2duT0tAkoyPGHyexy7NBDP4VrfRjsxGpegf0orasA&oe=690409D0)

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.
